thread.title: Evacuation, injuries reported as blast & fire rip through Paris metro station — RT News
thread.title_full: Evacuation, injuries reported as blast & fire rip through Paris metro station — RT News

title: Evacuation, injuries reported as blast & fire rip through Paris metro station — RT News
text:
Evacuation, injuries reported as blast & fire rip through Paris metro station Published time: 8 Feb, 2017 21:45 Several people have reportedly been injured after fire broke out at the French capital’s Place d’Italie metro station following a loud explosion. Reports have tied the blast and the fire to electrical failure. 
DETAILS TO FOLLOW Incendie au metro Place d'Italie - Origine accidentelle
